name: Better Twitch Chat
description:
To see a Video demo: https://youtu.be/rRW8tFoONic
Get the Firefox add-on : https://addons.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/addon/better-twitch-chat/
This is something I've done for the last two days.
It makes some smooth transitions and more readable space when someone writes something in the chat.
It's also more user-friendly.

additional_info:
Last version changes the transition property from padding-left to transform: translateX() which is much smoother and more optimised for transitions!

Supports Dark-Mode, Theater mode, and most-likely all modes

It's the first version so if you find any problems, I'd be glad to fix them if you say it in the comments section!

And if you like it, don't hesitate to vote!
